### HotKey constructor
</br>


#### Represents the HotKey to control

```csharp
public HotKey(ConsoleKey key, bool alt = false, bool ctrl = false, bool shift = false)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| key | ConsoleKey to create |
| alt | With Alt key |
| ctrl | With Ctrl key |
| shift | With Shift key |

### Remarks

Create a HotKey
